price: Dedi ki: "Muhakkak ben Allah’ın kuluyum. Bana o kitabı vermiş ve beni nebî kılmıştır."
arabic: قَالَ إِنِّي عَبۡدُ ٱللَّهِ ءَاتَىٰنِيَ ٱلۡكِتَٰبَ وَجَعَلَنِي نَبِيّٗا

version.title: Turkish translation - Rowwad Tanslation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Turkish by Rowwad Translation Center in cooperation with Islamhouse.com in 1440 H.

meta.transliteration: qāla innī ʿabdu al-lahi ātāniya al-kitāba wajaʿalanī nabiyyan
